title: Upgrade MSRV to 1.61
body:
Thank you for helping out with embedded-graphics-simulator development! Please:

- [x] Check that you've added passing tests and documentation
- [x] Add an example where applicable
- [x] Add a `CHANGELOG.md` entry in the **Unreleased** section under the appropriate heading (**Added**, **Fixed**, etc) if your changes affect the **public API**
- [x] Run `rustfmt` on the project
- [x] Run `just build` (Linux/macOS only) and make sure it passes. If you use Windows, check that CI passes once you've opened the PR.

## PR description

title: Migrate to intra-doc links
body:
This PR changes the doc links to intra-doc links and uses rustdoc instead of checklinks to check the links in CI.

I just noticed that the README generation still needs some work to remove the intra-doc links.

title: Add note on setting LIBRARY_PATH for Homebrew
body:
Thank you for helping out with embedded-graphics-simulator development! Please:

- [ ] Check that you've added passing tests and documentation
- [ ] Add an example where applicable
- [ ] Add a `CHANGELOG.md` entry in the **Unreleased** section under the appropriate heading (**Added**, **Fixed**, etc) if your changes affect the **public API**
- [x] Run `rustfmt` on the project
- [x] Run `just build` (Linux/macOS only) and make sure it passes. If you use Windows, check that CI passes once you've opened the PR.

## PR description

This PR adds a note on setting `LIBRARY_PATH` for newer Homebrew installations with do not install or link their libraries in `/usr/local/lib`. For example, on M1 machines, Homebrew gets installed to `/opt/homebrew` and therefor libs reside in `/opt/homebrew/lib`.

This is stated in the documentation of the `sdl2` crate. But it took me some minutes to figure this out for myself.

title: Update to e-g 0.7.0
body: This PR updates the e-g dependency to 0.7.0.

title: Add SimulatorDisplay::diff
body:
This PR adds a `diff` method to `SimulatorDisplay`, which works similar to `MockDisplay::diff`. In the future this can be used to improve the output of failing CI tests, that use `SimulatorDisplay`.

@jamwaffles Could you create a new beta release after this is merged?

title: Add checking feature
Add raw output to SimulatorDisplay
body:
This PR adds `to_{be, le, ne}_bytes` methods to `SimulatorDisplay`. I'm using this feature in the new font conversion tool, which uses a `SimulatorDisplay` to draw the image of the glyphs. This image can then be exported to PNG and RAW files. IMO this feature could also be useful for other applications that need to generate data for use with `RawImage`.

I've also changed the PNG compression to `Best`. This can significantly reduce the size of the generated PNG files, which also reduces the size of the inlined images in the docs.

title: Move input handling example from embedded-graphics/examples
body:
Cc embedded-graphics/examples#12

title: Add features from png-target
body: This PR adds the features from `tools/png-target` in the e-g repo, like base64 and grayscale output, to the simulator PNG output. This reduces code duplication and adds support for `OutputSettings` to the PNG export.

title: Update to e-g beta.1
body:
This PR updates the e-g dependency to the latest beta.

@jamwaffles A simulator beta release, after this PR is merged, would be useful to update the other crates to the e-g beta.

title: Use latest CI docker image
body: This PR updates the docker image to the latest version.

title: Remove docs directory and update deps
body: This PR removes the `docs` directory, removes the `tinybmp` and `tinytga` dependencies and updates e-g to `0.7-alpha.3`.

title: Fix a misleading error message for scale == 0
body: "scale must be >= 0" would mean 0 is acceptable while it is not.

title: Add link to examples repository
body: A carryon from #17 where all examples where moved to embedded-graphics/examples.

## PR description

Tinytga and tinybmp have fresh alpha releases that point to e-g-core
which now makes the simulator compile (locally at least...)

This will allow a simulator release of 0.3.0-alpha.1 to be made which will close #12.
